channel.title: Box on textbox.js
channel.description: Recent content in Box on textbox.js

item.title: InputTextBox
item.description: InputTextBox # The textbox with input component. Declaration # InputTextBox: TextBox Preset # { alias: { 'input_text': ['input', 'value'], 'input_type': ['input', 'type'], 'placeholder': ['input', 'placeholder'], 'max_length': ['input', 'max_length'], } } Configuration # input: Input

item.title: TextBox
item.description: TextBox # The textbox. Declaration # TextBox: BaseBox Preset # { alias: { 'button': 'buttons', 'btn_text': ['button', 'text'], 'btn_callback': ['button', 'callback'], } } Configuration # message: Message buttons: ButtonGroup

item.title: BaseBox
item.description: BaseBox # The most basic box. Declaration # BaseBox: Component Prototype # render: () => void Render and display this box. (Animate) show: () => void Show this box from hidden state. (Animate) hide: () => void Hide this box from non-hidden state. (Animate) destroy: (completion?: () => void) => void Destroy this box, and completion will be called when box is completely destroyed. (Animate) remove: () => void Remove this box instantly.
